Description:
Detects usage of "IMEWDBLD.exe" to download arbitrary files

Author: Swachchhanda Shrawan Poudel
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Arbitrary File Download Via IMEWDBLD.EXE
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((command like '%http://%' or command like '%https://%') and (process_path like '%\imewdbld.exe' and original_file_name = 'imewdbld.exe'))
